price: Ndetse n’iyo basomewe Qur’an ntibajya bubama.
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
